Prodigy League

Prodigy League Sponsored by Dota2India.com  to clash for an overall prize pool of $10,365 USD.  

  • Prize Distribution
    • $10,365 USD is spread among the teams as seen below:
      •  1st $5,365
      • 2nd $3,000
      • 3rd $2,000
  • Participants
    • Ten invited teams
  • Group Stage - Round-robin Nov 17th - Nov 26th, 2020
    • Two groups of four teams each
      • All matches are Bo3
      • Top two teams proceed to the Upper Bracket
      • 3rd to 4th place team advance to the lower bracket of the Playoffs, Bottom Two teams are Eliminated from the event. Playoffs
      • Double-elimination bracket
      • Grand final is Bo5, all other matches are of Bo3
      • Upper bracket winner has a one map advantage in the final
  • Rulebook
